revised_title: The Absence of Potassium in Protagon and the Pseudonuclei in Ovarian Ova
tldr: This article discusses the absence of potassium in the chemical compound "protagon" and the presence of pseudonuclei in ovarian ova. The author presents evidence against the presence of potassium in "protagon" and argues that it is not a pure chemical body. Additionally, the author mentions the behavior of ice and mercuric chloride at temperatures above their melting points.
